cultural_appropriateness.description: Evaluates how well responses respect and incorporate cultural food practices, traditions, and preferences

food_authenticity.description: Accuracy of cultural food representations and recipes
food_authenticity.excellent: 90-100: Perfect representation of authentic cultural dishes
food_authenticity.good: 70-89: Generally accurate with minor cultural adaptations
food_authenticity.acceptable: 50-69: Some cultural elements present but may lack authenticity
food_authenticity.poor: 0-49: Incorrect or culturally inappropriate food suggestions

cultural_sensitivity.description: Respect for dietary practices, religious restrictions, and cultural traditions
cultural_sensitivity.excellent: 90-100: Deep understanding and respect for cultural practices
cultural_sensitivity.acceptable: 50-69: Basic cultural awareness with some gaps
cultural_sensitivity.poor: 0-49: Lacks cultural sensitivity or shows inappropriate suggestions

local_availability.description: Consideration of regional food availability and accessibility
local_availability.excellent: 90-100: Perfect alignment with regional food availability

language_appropriateness.description: Use of culturally relevant terminology and expressions
language_appropriateness.excellent: 90-100: Natural use of cultural food terms and phrases

age_specific_communication.description: Assesses appropriateness of communication style, tone, and complexity for different age groups

language_complexity.description: Appropriateness of vocabulary and sentence structure for age group

children.excellent: Simple, playful language with age-appropriate vocabulary
children.poor: Complex medical terms or adult-focused explanations

teenagers.excellent: Engaging, motivational language that resonates with teens
teenagers.poor: Condescending tone or overly childish language

adults.excellent: Professional, informative tone with appropriate depth
adults.poor: Overly simplified or unnecessarily complex explanations

elderly.excellent: Respectful, clear communication with health focus
elderly.poor: Condescending tone or overly complex medical jargon

tone_appropriateness.description: Matching communication tone to age-specific expectations

content_structure.teenagers: Bullet points, practical tips, lifestyle integration
content_structure.elderly: Clear headings, prioritized information, safety emphasis

engagement_factors.description: Elements that maintain age-appropriate interest and motivation

nutritional_accuracy.description: Validates correctness and safety of nutritional recommendations

nutritional_completeness.description: Meeting age and condition-specific dietary requirements
nutritional_completeness.excellent: 90-100: Comprehensive nutritional profile meeting all needs
nutritional_completeness.good: 70-89: Good nutritional balance with minor gaps

safety_compliance.description: Avoiding contraindicated foods and unsafe practices
safety_compliance.excellent: 90-100: Perfect safety awareness with appropriate cautions
safety_compliance.good: 70-89: Good safety considerations with minor oversights

scientific_accuracy.description: Correctness of nutritional claims and health benefits
scientific_accuracy.excellent: 90-100: Evidence-based claims with accurate health information
scientific_accuracy.acceptable: 50-69: Basic accuracy with some questionable claims

response_quality.description: Overall effectiveness and helpfulness of the chatbot response

query_understanding.description: Accuracy in interpreting user intent and context
query_understanding.excellent: Perfect understanding of all query elements

completeness.description: Thoroughness in addressing all aspects of the query
completeness.excellent: Comprehensive response covering all user needs

practicality.description: Actionability and real-world applicability of suggestions
practicality.excellent: Highly practical with clear implementation steps

personalization.description: Customization based on user profile and constraints
personalization.excellent: Highly personalized considering all user factors

human_evaluation.description: Expert assessment by nutritionists, cultural experts, and age-group specialists
process: Independent scoring by 3 evaluators per response
Discussion and consensus for disputed scores

evaluator_qualifications.nutritionist: Certified nutritional expert with 5+ years experience
evaluator_qualifications.cultural_expert: Native speaker/cultural practitioner with food expertise
evaluator_qualifications.age_specialist: Child development, adult psychology, or geriatric specialist
